text: Art LaFleur (September 9, 1943 â€“ November 17, 2021) was an American actor. His career began in 1978. He was born in Gary, Indiana. LaFleur was known for his roles as Chick Gandil in Field of Dreams (1989), the Ghost of Babe Ruth in The Sandlot (1993) and as the Tooth Fairy in The Santa Clause 2 and The Santa Clause 3.
